name: Ent
description:
The Game

Ent is inspired by strategy / life-sim games like Populous and Settlers, with roguelike influences. It is designed to be a relaxed experience, akin to owning an ant-farm. Guide your followers to explore an endless procedurally-generated world. Currently in-development for the 1bit clicker jam.

How to Play

Tap / click a well to to create followers
Tap / click a follower to build a monolith to attract other followers
Explore

If you're interested in the procedural generation methods used in Ent, check out my other project, the Level Generator Toolkit for Construct 2.
